Posts.Content: Aug 9, 2010 12:13AM Sandy05 wrote: I was diagnoised a month ago with IDC also traveled into my lymph nodles. I am 69 years old and also scared to death. My doctors wanted to start my chemo before surgery to shrink the cancer. I had my first chemo treatment  of Adrigmyclin and Cytoxan on Aug. 4..(2 weeks apart)  I have to have 4 cycles of those two drugs and then start 4 cycles of Taxotete ...(3 weeks apart)  I just pray to God that I will make it through this chemo and surgery and have a good chance of emjoying some happy healthy years of  life to see my 3 great grandsons grow up.
Posts.Title: Poll - How old were you when dx with BC Times3 Minetta57
